SEARCH
Module net.sourceforge.joceanus.prometheus.core
Package net.sourceforge.joceanus.prometheus.database

Class PrometheusTableDefinition

java.lang.Object
net.sourceforge.joceanus.prometheus.database.PrometheusTableDefinition
public class PrometheusTableDefinition extends Object
Database field definition class. Maps each dataType to a database field.
